item.description: OK, we have all wanted to figure out the next step. How do we know what we really want? What is the perfect friend? perfect customer? perfect employee? We think we know but what happens when it is time to put the words down on paper? If you are serious and you really want to make the list and make a committment to what would be perfect, then join this meeting. We will each define what we are looking for and when we leave at the end of the evening we will leave with our list in hand. You have time to focus on this. What do you want to draw into your life????

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Attracting Your Perfect Customer, SoulMate, Family or Friends
